text: Nan hæla khux sing thi kıl ying kwa nı kar thi phwk khea ca na ma sung kar pen phyan tam khwam pen cring khxng man hrux nı kar thi phwk khea klaw wa kha saban ca thuk ptiseth hlangcak thi phwk khea saban cng ya ke rng xallxhˌ læa cng sdab fang theid thæ cring xallxhˌ nan ca mi thrng næana phwk thi pen phu lameid
